item.title: CLAIO 2022
item.description:
On this occasion, Professor Diego F. Manotas from the Universidad del Valle presented the research “Decision tools from indexed fund financing to explore the path towards a renewable energy generation scenario with globalization and high specialization of regional electricity markets” at the XXI LATIN IBERO-AMERICAN CONFERENCE ON OPERATIONS RESEARCH - CLAIO 2022 in Buenos Aires, Argentina.

This research is carried out jointly with Professor Jorge M. Uribe from the Universidad Oberta de CataluÃ±a and myself. This is the second event in which this research is presented. In November 2022 it was presented at the 8th ELAEE - 2022.
